confirmation.subject: Email confirmation
confirmation.preview: Confirm your email, your code is {token}
confirmation.title: Email confirmation

content.heading: Confirm your account login

greeting.2: Someone is trying to register using your email!
greeting.3: If it's you, just confirm your email to start using your account

content.code: To confirm your email, enter the following code

password_recovery.subject: Password recovery
password_recovery.preview: Password recover. Follow the link to reset your password
password_recovery.title: Reset your account password

content.heading: Follow the link to reset your password

greeting.2: Someone requested a password reset from your account, if it's not you, then check
greeting.3: in the settings for devices unknown to you

button.label: To recover the password, please click on the button below:

tfa.subject: Two-factor authentication
tfa.preview: Two-factor authentication. Enter the code, {token}, to sign in to your account
tfa.title: Account sign in confirmation

content.heading: Confirm signing in to your account

greeting.2: Someone is trying to sign in to your account from a new device!

content.code: To sign in, enter the following code

shared.codeLifetime: Pay attention! The code is only valid for 30 minutes.

notYou.default: If you didn't initiate this request, please ignore this message

withAdvice.1: If you didn't initiate this request, please. ignore this message, you should also

shared.support: If you have any questions or encounter difficulties, do not hesitate to contact our support team at
shared.noreply: Do not reply to this email. It was sent by a robot

errors.auth_to_have_access: To access this resource, you must be logged in
errors.not_have_access: You don't have access to this resource
errors.invalid_password:
Invalid password.
Please check the entered data again
errors.tfa_not_enabled: Two-factor authentication is not enabled on this account

ddos.default: Too many requests, try again later

email.is_exist: This email is already occupied by another user

username.is_exist: This username is already occupied by another user

phone.is_exist: This phone number is already occupied by another user

provider.not_found: No provider with this ID was found
provider.already_connected_by_you: {provider} is already connected to your account
provider.already_connected: {provider} is already connected to another account

notifications.not_read_to_archive: Notification has not been read to be archived

verification.invalid_code:
You entered the wrong code.
Please check the correctness of the input
verification.code_expired:
This code has expired.
Try requesting a new code
verification.password_recovery_token_missing: Password recovery token is invalid or not provided

account.not_found:
There is no account with this email address or username.
Please check the entered data again
account.not_found_email:
There is no account with this email address or username.
Please check the data again
account.not_verified:
You have unverified account!
To continue, please, verify it now

profile.avatar_not_found: You should have an installed avatar to delete it
profile.phone_number_is_exist: Phone number is already occupied by another user
profile.settings_not_found: No user settings found, please contact support

500.default:
Server error 500.
Repeat the request later
500.cant_send_email: Couldn't send email, try again later
500.cant_remove_session: Couldn't end session, try again later
500.cant_save_session: Couldn't save session, try again later
